main event: A military radar tracked an unidentified object in Spanish Morocco on December 2, 1954.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as a bright light that rapidly increased in size to a very bright, large shape and then decreased in size to a small bright light.
The object remained stationary for about 60 seconds and then sped off at high speed.
The object was observed visually and on radar for a total time of about 3 minutes.
The object appeared to be pale blue and yellow, slightly elongated, with a tendency to flutter.
The object accelerated to a speed of 1430 knots and then slowed down to 95-92 knots before descending and disappearing.
sighted object: a bright light that rapidly changed in size and speed
photographs: no photographs present in the document
